name: ng-generate
description: Run Angular CLI generate commands from folder context menu

ngGenerate.component.standalone.description: Whether generated components should be standalone

ngGenerate.component.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for components

ngGenerate.component.inlineStyle.description: Include styles inline in the component.ts file

ngGenerate.component.inlineTemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file

ngGenerate.component.style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files

ngGenerate.component.changeDetection.description: The change detection strategy to use in the new component

ngGenerate.component.flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.service.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for services

ngGenerate.service.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.module.flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.directive.standalone.description: Whether generated directives should be standalone

ngGenerate.directive.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for directives

ngGenerate.directive.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.pipe.standalone.description: Whether generated pipes should be standalone

ngGenerate.pipe.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for pipes

ngGenerate.pipe.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.guard.functional.description: Specifies whether to generate a guard as a function

ngGenerate.guard.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for guards

ngGenerate.guard.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.interceptor.functional.description: Creates the interceptor as a HttpInterceptorFn

ngGenerate.interceptor.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for interceptors

ngGenerate.interceptor.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

ngGenerate.class.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for classes

ngGenerate.resolver.functional.description: Creates the resolver as a ResolveFn

ngGenerate.resolver.skipTests.description: Skip creating spec.ts test files for resolvers

ngGenerate.resolver.flat.description: Create files at the top level of the current folder

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
